translation: Confusion of castes leads to hell for the slayers of the family, for their forebears fall, deprived of the offerings of rice-balls and libations of water.
commentary: 1.42 Sankara: confusion of castes? Hell for the hell? Eve also? of the slayers of the family?of the family? f and? Fall fall? The forefathers the forefathers? Hi verily? These their? Luptapindodakakriyas deprived of the offerings of ricall and water.No Commentary.
